ValidationRule.description: Contact Name of Inactive Contact cannot be edited.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( RecordType.DeveloperName ='NS_ReadOnlyInactiveContact', OR( $Profile.Name = 'OSS Rep', $Profile.Name = 'OSS Manager', $Profile.Name = 'OSS Support', $Profile.Name = 'OSS Manager Sales and Service' ), NOT(ISNEW()), OR( ISCHANGED(FirstName), ISCHANGED( LastName ), ISCHANGED( Salutation ) ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Inactive Contact name cannot be edited.
